extTitle.description: the name of extension with browser_action

extDescription.message: This is use to replace the download function of browser.

openDownloadFolder.description: the tips of open download folder button

downloadFolder.description: the text of open download folder button

clearAllHistory.description: the tips of clear all history button

clear.description: the text of clear all history button

empty.description: the text with an empty history

cancelDownload.description: the tips of cancel download button

cancel.description: the text of cancel download button

open.description: the text of open button in notice

openFolder.description: the text of open folder button in notice

urlDanger.message: The download's URL is known to be malicious.

contentDanger.message: The downloaded file is known to be malicious.

uncommonDanger.message: The download's URL is not commonly downloaded and could be dangerous.

hostDanger.message: The download came from a host known to distribute malicious binaries and is likely dangerous.

unwantedDanger.message: The download is potentially unwanted or unsafe. E.g. it could make changes to browser or computer settings.

safeDanger.message: The download presents no known danger to the user's computer.

acceptedDanger.message: The user has accepted the dangerous download.

total.description: the tips of file total size

deleteHistory.description: the tips of delete history in downloading

accept.description: the text of accept danger download button

saveFile.description: the tips of accept danger download

options.description: the title of DownloadManager config page

iconAuto.description: auto set icon by browser's theme type

soundOff.description: does not play sound when download complete

downloadNotice.description: send a notification to user when you are downloading

startNotice.description: send a notification to user when you start downloading

completeNotice.description: send a notification to user when download complete

dangerNotice.description: send a notification to user when download file is danger

tryAutoResumeFail.description: This automatic resume task failed, and will automatically try to recover again later

downloadAutoResume.description: This allows the user to auto resume downloads that have failed due to non-human cancel.
